name: button(L/R)
content: `buttonL` and `buttonR` are objects representing the two pushbuttons on the Circuit Playground. Internally `buttonL` is connected to pin 4 and `buttonR` is connected to pin 19. ### Properties and Methods * `buttonL.isPressed` - Boolean property, `true` is the button is being pushed down, otherwise `false` * `buttonL.holdtime` - Number of milliseconds for button to be held down before "hold" event is fired ### Events * "press" - Fired when button is pressed down and then released * "down" - Fired when button is pressed down * "up" - Fired when button is released * "hold" - Fired when button has been held down for duration set by `button.holdtime`
